title: ACS College of Engineering ( ACSCE) Banagalore: Admission, Fees, Ranking, Cutoff, Scholarship, Courses
meta_description: ACS College of Engineering B.Tech Admission 2024 is open via COMEDK and KCET scores. Candidates applying through KCET scores must register for KEA counselling on the official website cetonline.karnataka.gov.in

basic_info.name: ACS College of Engineering Hostel
description: ACSCE Bangalore provide hostel accommodation to both girls and boys with a capacity of 300 seats each. The hostels are well-furnished rooms, attached bathrooms, beds, wardrobes, study tables, and chairs. In addition to this, the hostels also provide facilities like Laundry, mess, etc.
Guest and visitors are also offered a seat which are available on advance intimation and availability.

basic_info.name: ACS College of Engineering College Facilities

Section.name: About ACSCE
Section.description:
ACS College of Engineering in Bangalore is established in the year 2009, affiliated to Visvesvaraya Technological University, Belagavi and also approved by All India Council of Technical Education, New Delhi. The institute offers a wide range of courses in the field of Engineering including new courses like Aeronautical Engineering and Bio-Medical Engineering.
ACSCE Bangalore offers BE and M.Tech in various specializations. The selection of students to all the courses is made on marks obtained in national-level qualifying exams such as CET, COMED K, and GATE etc. The last round closing rank for KCET and COMED K for the B.E. program remained at 202306 (General) and 73745 (General) respectively.
Out of 115 faculty members, 67 members of the faculty has a Ph.D. degree in their specialized fields. ACS College of Enigneering has recently placed a total of 554+ students in well-reputed companies like Capgemini, Mphasis, HP, Oracle, TechMahindra, Wissen, Eneffen, Artech, Trigent, BPL Medical Technologies, etc. The median salary offered to students ranges between INR 2 LPA to INR 9 LPA for all the Graduates.
Read More: ACS College of Engineering Admission
Table of Content
ACS College of Engineering offers Undergraduate, Postgraduate, and Research programs in the fields of Engineering in various specializations. Given below are the details of the same:
Specializations: Aeronautical, Aerospace, Bio-Medical, Civil, Computer Science, Electronics Communication Engineering, Mechanical, Computer Science Engineering (Data Science), Computer Science Engineering (Cyber Security), and Computer Science Engineering (IOT).
Eligibility: 45% marks in 10+2 in the science stream with English as a compulsory subject.
Specializations: Structural Engineering
Eligibility: 45% marks in Graduation.
Specializations: Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics, Aeronautical, Civil, Bio-Medical, Mechanical, Electrical Electronics, Electronics Communication, and Computer Science.
Eligibility: Master’s degree in the relevant discipline
